claim: Recombinant technology leads to a broader immune response that may provide cross-protection, even in a mismatch season.
explanation: Header from the Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report (MMWR), showing the title, volume, issue number, and date (August 26, 2022). does not support the claim: the image contains only the publication header and no data or statements regarding recombinant technology or immune response breadth. Note: Image only shows the report header; no substantive clinical or immunological information is visible.
